title: Elon Musk Blasts NFTs—And Bitcoin Fans Love It
description: On Joe Rogan’s latest podcast, Elon Musk revived a common criticism of NFTs—so why are Bitcoiners thrilled about it?

title: Bitcoin arrives on Cosmos with Nomic nBTC upgrade
description:
An upgrade that brings Bitcoin (BTC) into the Cosmos ecosystem has been completed,  according to various announcements on Oct. 31. Cosmos announced in a tweet that its Inter-Blockchain Communication Protocol (IBC) can now transfer nBTC — a token that represents 1:1 ownership of Bitcoin. Cosmos said that another group, Nomic, made this possible as it […]

The post Bitcoin arrives on Cosmos with Nomic nBTC upgrade appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: ShareRing Certified In The UK As A Trusted Digital Identity Services Provider
description: ShareRing, a true self-sovereign digital identity blockchain Australian company, proudly announces its achievement as one of the first in the industry to be accredited under the “Digital Identities and Attributes Trust Framework” (DIATF) in the United Kingdom.

title: ADA, AXS, MANA, ELON Showing Bullish Spikes in Onchain Metrics
description:
In a recent tweet, prominent market tracker Santiment highlighted the noteworthy crypto projects that have led in various on-chain alpha metrics based on their performance observed since August. Specifically, Santiment highlighted about ten cryptocurrencies that recorded bullish spikes against their respective three-month average.  Notably, the metrics used to measure these bullish spikes include active addresses, […]

The post ADA, AXS, MANA, ELON Showing Bullish Spikes in Onchain Metrics appeared first on Coin Edition.

title: FTX and Alameda Research Dump $83.6 Million on Binance, Coinbase
description:
In a recent development, it has come to light that addresses closely associated with the bankrupt crypto projects FTX and Alameda have engaged in significant transfers again within the last 24 hours.  According to multiple on-chain tracking resources, FTX-tagged wallets have moved six crypto assets worth over $13.6 to crypto exchanges Binance and Coinbase today […]

The post FTX and Alameda Research Dump $83.6 Million on Binance, Coinbase appeared first on Coin Edition.
